Row.Text: An imageboard or image board is a type of Internet forum which operates mostly via posting images. The first imageboards were created in Japan, and many English language imageboards today are centered on Japanese culture. They are based on the textboard concept.

Imageboards are generally awful places, filled with debauchery and chaos. However, this is the optimal environment for the formation of "memes", which are cultural analogues of genes. Just as genes shape the body, memes shape the mind.
Shady government agencies most definitely do not interact with imageboards in any capacity, nor is there any reason for them to do so.
Meme Magicians are elite practicioners of applied memetics. They work to shape the world by shaping public thought.

The first meme magicians discovered their power by accident, after the memes they had created online happened to spread into reality. Upon realizing this, the Society of Memetic Magick was created, which worked underground to understand and refine the practice. Seasoned meme magicians worked extensively throughout the 2016 U.S. Presidential Election, and were successful in awakening the ancient Egyptian god Kek from his slumber.

A border guard of a country is a national security agency that performs border control, i.e., enforces the security of the country's national borders. They are generally racist and sexist neo-Nazis who love nothing more than oppressing poor innocent undocumented citizens, who usually haven't committed any crimes. After all, no human being is illegal, goy.

After Trump assumed control of the United States in 2017, U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement was transformed into a nationwide militant police force tasked with the swift and violent "removal" of any person suspected of being in the country illegally. To accomplish this task, agents frequently employed the use of nerve gas and flamethrowers, and often made sport of illegals attempting to flee. In 2019, I.C.E. became responsible for keeping citizens of the newly-annexed Mexico in line.
Trump focuses on [ICON_GOLD] Gold output, supplementing Kekistan's ability to aggressively push its religion.

Kekistan is best suited to either a religious or a cultural victory, due to the bonuses to faith output and tourism it gets from its unique ability. The Meme Magician allows Kekistan to spread its religion with wild abandon, while the Imageboard Server provides [ICON_FAITH] Faith, [ICON_CULTURE] Culture, and [ICON_AMENITY] Amenities. The Printing and Computers technologies are important milestones for Kekistan, as they both give boosts to Kekistan's ability upon being researched. Finally, Trump's leader bonus provides extra [ICON_GOLD] Gold, allowing for a bit more purchasing power and flexibility.

Hail, Donald J. Trump, God-Emperor of mankind! Long had you waited, biding your time until you were ready to claim the mantle of leadership. Harsh was your struggle against the servants of the dark god Moloch--but, with the guidance and blessing of Kek, the power of meme magic gave you the strength to prevail. Now, it is time to lead your people to prosperity. By harnessing the awesome power of memetics, as well as applying your mastery of "the deal", you will be able to mold the very fabric of reality.

Donald J. Trump is an egregore formed out of the collective consiousness of the Internet in the year 2015. His creation was foretold in the Prophecy of Kek, and his arrival in the material world signalled the awakening of Kek. Trump was sent to battle the agent of Moloch, Hillary Clinton, ultimately defeating her and securing the U.S. Presidency in late 2016.

Trump's victory brought about the Age of Kek, a golden age of humanity which saw the world cleansed of the evils that had been working to destroy civilization. Trump's reign extended into the year 2073, upon which he "retired", returning to the ethereal mists of the 8th dimension. His son-spawn, Barron Trump, assumed the Golden Throne and led mankind into the cosmos.

In AD 420, the Kekistani people were heavily persecuted by Shapur I of the Sassanid Empire, who crushed a Kekistani liberation movement, exterminating 9/11ths of the population in what is known to historians as the Kekistani Genocide. The Kekistani fled to Kekstantinople, where Justinian I gave them sanctuary and allowed them to practice their religion of peace. The Kekistanis became humble, yet prosperous, farmers, often producing a bountiful yield of memes out of barren soil. Other Kekistani people fled to Israel, where they stayed for years until the Romans exiled the Kekistanis. These Kekistani people fled across Africa and the Middle East.

In the late 1980s, After The Great Kek Fraud, the USSR invaded the great land of Kekistan.They seized their Memes and introduced the Soviet Kekistani. This only lasted until the fantastic Autistic Screeching of 1993.

In 2016, the prophet Alex Jones uncovered the plot by the global elites to further oppress the Kekistani people. He dubbed it the "Gay Bomb", tasked with turning every Kekistani citizen homosexual, thus ensuring the termination of the Kekistani people. Fortunately, Alex Jones broke the conditioning and the Kekistani people were able to escape such ill-willed fate by harnessing the power of meme magic and influencing the American people to elect God-Emperor Donald J. Trump to power.
Israel must be wiped off the face of the Earth!
Welcome to Kekistan. We are a humble nation of peace. Behead those who insult Kek.
Would you like to legally come visit our capital?
Perhaps we could exchange info on each other's capitals. That sounds nice, don't you think?
Sure. It's going to be tremendous.
We could be the greatest friends, you know? It'd be huge.
You're a real bad hombre. You're gonna get yours.
Your country is about to be in serious trouble.
I hope you enjoy watching the downfall of western civilization.
I hope you enjoy watching the downfall of western civilization.
Your delegation got here fine. I'll make sure they're put in one of my best hotels.
I've sent a delegation to you. Make sure they're treated well, alright?
You're all talk, no action. Very low energy. (Denounces You)
We'd like to set up an embassy in your capital.
We're gonna have a great relationship.
It'd be outstanding if you'd form an alliance with us.
Sorry, but I only make good deals.
We only make the best deals, don't we?
This would be a better deal.
You think you can just push me around?
I think it's about time we made peace, don't you?
Well then, I hope you have the stamina to continue.
That's fine. You can come in legally.
Not until we can figure out what's going on.
We'd like to move some units through your territory.
I'm so sorry about that. I'll make sure it doesn't happen again.
Sorry, but we need that territory.
Your people are getting a bit too close for comfort.
If you won't respect our border, then I won't respect you.
Sorry about that. We're just doing some exercises, believe me.
I'll move our troops where I like. It's not like I'm doing it illegally.
Of course. It's all just a misunderstanding.
Sure, we can stop digging those up.
I'm sorry you feel that way, but we'll stop.
I'm sure your troops are good people, but unfortunately they have to go back.
Get your spies out of my country immediately.
I'd appreciate it if you told your archaeologists to stop digging up our artifacts.
Your missionaries aren't welcome here. Get them out.
Your missionaries are here illegally. If you don't get them out, we're going to have a problem.
If you won't respect our borders, then I won't respect you.
You're running your country great--the economy is booming and people have jobs.
(You have a strong economy and industry)
Your country doesn't seem to be doing so well. Maybe you should try making better deals.
(You have a weak economy and industry.)
